intro: Gasteria ensifolia, commonly known as the sword leaf gasteria, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It features rosettes of thick, fleshy, sword-shaped leaves that are typically green with white or silver markings. The plant produces tall, branched inflorescences bearing small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is well adapted to arid conditions, storing water in its leaves and stems. Gasteria ensifolia is popular as a houseplant due to its hardiness and attractive appearance.
